Body:
flexure = 1.0
master_file = os.path.join(os.getenv('PYPEIT_DEV'), 'Cooked',
    'shane_kast_blue', 'MasterTilts_A_1_01.fits')
waveTilts = wavetilts.WaveTilts.from_file(master_file)
slit_file = os.path.join(os.getenv('PYPEIT_DEV'), 'Cooked',
    'shane_kast_blue', 'MasterSlits_A_1_01.fits.gz')
slits = slittrace.SlitTraceSet.from_file(slit_file)
slitmask = slits.slit_img(flexure=flexure)
new_tilts = waveTilts.fit2tiltimg(slitmask, flexure=flexure)
cooked_required
